title: Yeah, so i crashed too,  but i got a 20 min queue slapped on me and i lost a lot of LP.
body: As i heard, riot was under attack, and caused a lot of people to DC.  However, when I DC'ed from my ranked game I was immediately hit with 20 min afk queue and i lost a lot of LP because i was  "leaver."  Am i going to get any compensation for this?  Can i at least have my LP and Queue Timer revoked?

replies.body: Looks like it happened to a bunch of us, I still can't play either >.> been waiting over 13 hours to play today, then get one game with an afk and 2 feeders, then I get a could match to be cheated out of it and penalized. So not happy, I know it happens but gr wish I could play...

Thanks for bringing this to our attention! We made a post when we were made aware of the issue impacting our servers, which you can find [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues). 

Rest assured that we're working as fast as we can to address everyone's individual case!

It's great you are aware of and have mostly fixed the connection issues; but what are you doing about compensating the hundreds or even thousands of players that have lost LP, promos, etc? The problem persisted now for about 12 hours -- the whole day -- and not once was loss prevention enabled. Where is the compensation for those of us who had our time and efforts wasted and lost a lot of ranked game progress due to an error on your end?
